game.name: Your Painting, Sir
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Recreate paintings using newspaper cutouts — Analyze the painting, search the newspaper for similar elements, carefully cut them out, and place them on their correct position. Will you fool your boss with your arts and crafts?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Recreate paintings using newspaper cutouts — Analyze the painting, search the newspaper for similar elements, carefully cut them out, and place them on their correct position. Will you fool your boss with your arts and crafts?
